definition[0]: to be attacked, shot at etc
example[0]: The government has come under attack from opposition leaders over proposals to cut health spending.
definition[1]: to be governed or controlled by a particular organization or person
example[1]: The organization comes under the authority of the EU.
definition[2]: if a piece of information comes under a particular title, you can find it under that title
example[2]: The proposals come under three main headings.
